# CartGoals - Multi-Goal Cart Gamification for Shopify

CartGoals is a Shopify app that transforms shopping carts into gamified quests with multi-goal progress tracking. Merchants use it to increase average order value by visualizing progress toward rewards like free shipping, free gifts, discounts, and gift cards.

## Key Features

- **Multi-Goal Progress Tracking**: Up to 5 goals (Standard) or unlimited (Plus)
- **Auto-Detect Shipping Zones**: Automatically adjusts free shipping thresholds based on customer location
- **Celebration Animations**: Sparkle effects and smooth animations when goals are reached
- **Zero Configuration**: Works out of the box with existing Shopify setup
- **Mobile Responsive**: Beautiful on all devices

## Pricing

- **Free Beta**: Join now, stay premium forever ($0/month for life)
- **Standard**: $34.99/month - Up to 5 goals, perfect for growing stores
- **Plus**: $79.99/month - Unlimited goals, custom branding, advanced analytics, priority support

## How It Works

1. Install CartGoals from Shopify App Store
2. App auto-detects your shipping zones and product catalog
3. Configure up to 5 goals (free shipping, gifts, discounts, etc.)
4. CartGoals displays progress bar on cart page
5. Customers chase rewards, average order value increases

## Proven Results

CartGoals increases average order value by creating urgency and gamifying the shopping experience. Customers spend more to unlock rewards.
